languages.text: "Зачем тебе, ничтожество?" {n}Друкари замирает на мгновение — и вы видите, как дрожат его руки.{/n} "Тервантьяс прислал тебя за эссенцией боли, не так ли?.. Скажи ему, что последние образцы... вышли бракованными. Требуется время, чтобы извлечь незамутненную боль. Да, много времени. Мон-кай упрям и силен, но его жизненные силы почти на исходе. Нужно... сосредоточиться". {n}Пыточник тянется подрагивающими руками к своей жертве.{/n}

"Why do you care, cattle?" {n}The Drukhari freezes for a moment, and you notice his hands shaking.{/n} "Tervantias sent you for the essence of pain, didn't he? Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зачем тебе, ничтожество?" {n}Друкари замирает на мгновение — и вы видите, как дрожат его руки.{/n} "Тервантьяс прислал тебя за эссенцией боли, не так ли?.. Скажи ему, что последние образцы... вышли бракованными. Требуется время, чтобы извлечь незамутненную боль. Да, много времени. Мон-кай упрям и силен, но его жизненные силы почти на исходе. Нужно... сосредоточиться". {n}Пыточник тянется подрагивающими руками к своей жертве.{/n}

Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

languages.text: 「なぜ気にする、家畜？」{n}デュカーリは一瞬固まり、あなたは彼の手が震えているのに気づいた。{/n}「テルヴァンティアスに痛みのエッセンスを 取りに行くよう言われたんだろう？最後のサンプルは…うまくいかなかったと伝えてくれ。純粋な痛みを抽出するには時間がかかる。すごく長い時間がね。モン＝ケイは頑固で強いが、生命力が弱くなっている。とにかく…集中しなければ」{n}拷問者の痙攣する指が犠牲者に伸びる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why do you care, cattle?" {n}The Drukhari freezes for a moment, and you notice his hands shaking.{/n} "Tervantias sent you for the essence of pain, didn't he? Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ気にする、家畜？」{n}デュカーリは一瞬固まり、あなたは彼の手が震えているのに気づいた。{/n}「テルヴァンティアスに痛みのエッセンスを 取りに行くよう言われたんだろう？最後のサンプルは…うまくいかなかったと伝えてくれ。純粋な痛みを抽出するには時間がかかる。すごく長い時間がね。モン＝ケイは頑固で強いが、生命力が弱くなっている。とにかく…集中しなければ」{n}拷問者の痙攣する指が犠牲者に伸びる。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: “关你什么事情，你这头畜生？”{n}说完这句话，黑暗灵族僵了一会儿，你注意到他的双手在颤抖着。{/n}“是特万提亚斯派你来取痛苦精华，是吧？告诉他，最后这批样本……很糟糕。我得需要额外的时间，才能提取出纯粹的、没有一丝杂质的痛苦。没错，需要很长时间。这只猴子坚韧而强壮，但他的力量正在衰退。我只需要……集中注意力就好了。”{n}行刑者伸出抽搐的手指，伸向了他的受害者。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why do you care, cattle?" {n}The Drukhari freezes for a moment, and you notice his hands shaking.{/n} "Tervantias sent you for the essence of pain, didn't he? Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “关你什么事情，你这个蠢货？”{n}说完这句话，黑暗灵族僵了一会儿，你注意到他的双手在颤抖着。{/n}“是特万提亚斯派你来取痛苦精华，是吧？告诉他，最后这批样本……很糟糕。我得需要额外的时间，才能提取出纯粹的、没有一丝杂质的痛苦。没错，需要很长时间。这只猴子坚韧而强壮，但他的力量正在衰退。我只需要……集中注意力就好了。”{n}行刑者伸出抽搐的手指，伸向了他的受害者。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: «¿Y a ti qué te importa, ganado?». {n}El Drukhari se detiene por un momento y notas que le tiemblan las manos.{/n} «Te ha enviado Tervantias a por la esencia del dolor, ¿verdad? Dile que las últimas muestras... salieron mal. Llevará tiempo extraer el dolor puro, sin adulterar. Sí, mucho tiempo. El mon-keigh es terco y fuerte, pero su vitalidad está disminuyendo. Solo necesito... concentrarme». {n}Los dedos temblorosos del torturador se estiran hacia su víctima.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why do you care, cattle?" {n}The Drukhari freezes for a moment, and you notice his hands shaking.{/n} "Tervantias sent you for the essence of pain, didn't he? Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Y a ti qué te importa, ganado?». {n}El Drukhari se detiene por un momento y notas que le tiemblan las manos.{/n} «Te ha enviado Tervantias a por la esencia del dolor, ¿verdad? Dile que las últimas muestras... salieron mal. Llevará tiempo extraer el dolor puro, sin adulterar. Sí, mucho tiempo. El mon-keigh es terco y fuerte, pero su vitalidad está disminuyendo. Solo necesito... concentrarme». {n}Los dedos temblorosos del torturador se estiran hacia su víctima.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: "Was schert es Euch, Vieh?" {n}Der Drukhari erstarrt einen Augenblick und du bemerkst, dass seine Hände zittern.{/n} "Tervantias hat Euch wegen der Essenz der Schmerzen geschickt, nicht wahr? Sagt ihm, dass die letzten Proben ... schlecht waren. Es wird dauern, aus ihnen reine, unverfälschte Schmerzen zu extrahieren. Ja, es wird lange dauern. Der Chem-Pan-Sey ist stur und stark, aber seine Lebenskraft lässt nach. Ich muss mich ... konzentrieren." {n}Die zuckenden Finger des Folterknechts strecken sich nach seinem Opfer aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why do you care, cattle?" {n}The Drukhari freezes for a moment, and you notice his hands shaking.{/n} "Tervantias sent you for the essence of pain, didn't he? Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was schert es Euch, Ihr Arschloch?" {n}Der Drukhari erstart einen Augenblick lang, und du bemerkst, dass seine Hände zittern.{/n} "Tervantias hat Euch wegen der Essenz der Schmerzen geschickt, nicht wahr? Sagt ihm, dass die letzten Proben ... schlecht waren. Es wird dauern, aus ihnen reine, unverfälschte Schmerzen zu extrahieren. Ja, es wird lange dauern. Der Chem-Pan-Sey ist stur und stark, aber seine Lebenskraft lässt nach. Ich muss mich ... konzentrieren." {n}Die zuckenden Finger des Folterknechts strecken sich nach seinem Opfer aus.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que ça peut bien vous faire, le bétail ? » {n}Le Drukhari se fige un instant, mais vous remarquez que ses mains tremblent.{/n} « C'est Tervantias qui vous envoie pour l'essence de douleur, c'est ça ? Dites-lui que les derniers échantillons... n'étaient pas concluants. Pour extraire la souffrance à l'état pur, il va nous falloir du temps. Oui, beaucoup de temps. Ce mon-keigh est tenace, mais sa vitalité décline. Je dois juste... me concentrer. » {n}Les doigts tremblants du tortionnaire se tendent vers sa victime.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why do you care, cattle?" {n}The Drukhari freezes for a moment, and you notice his hands shaking.{/n} "Tervantias sent you for the essence of pain, didn't he? Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que ça peut bien vous faire, vermine ? » {n}Le Drukhari se fige un instant, mais vous remarquez que ses mains tremblent de manière incontrôlable.{/n} « C'est Tervantias qui vous envoie pour l'essence de douleur, c'est ça ? Dites-lui que les derniers échantillons... n'étaient pas concluants. Pour extraire la souffrance à l'état pur, il va nous falloir du temps. Oui, beaucoup de temps. Ce mon-keigh est tenace, mais sa vitalité décline. Je dois juste... me concentrer. » {n}Les doigts tremblants du tortionnaire se tendent vers sa victime.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: "Sana ne sığır?" {n}Bir anlığına donakalan Drukhari'nin ellerinin titrediğini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Tervantias seni ızdırap özünü almaya gönderdi, değil mi? Git söyle ona, son numuneler... Son numuneler kötü çıktı. Saf ve katıksız ızdırap çıkarmak zaman alacak. Hem de çok. Bu mon-keigh, inatçı ve güçlü olsa da zindeliği azalıyor. Benim... Odaklanmam lazım." {n}İşkencecinin seğiren parmakları, kurbanına uzanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why do you care, cattle?" {n}The Drukhari freezes for a moment, and you notice his hands shaking.{/n} "Tervantias sent you for the essence of pain, didn't he? Tell him that the last samples... turned out bad. It will take time to extract pure, unadulterated pain. Yes, a very long time. The mon-keigh is stubborn and strong, but his vitality is waning. I just need... to concentrate." {n}The torturer's twitching fingers reach for his victim.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sana ne sığır?" {n}Drukhari bir anlığına donakalınca ellerinin titrediğini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Tervantias seni ızdırap özünü alman için göndermiş, değil mi? Git söyle ona, son numuneler... Son numuneler kötü çıktı. Saf ve katıksız ızdırap çıkarmak zaman alacak. Hem de çok. Bu mon-keigh inatçı ve güçlü olsa da zindeliği azalıyor. Sadece... Odaklanmam lazım." {n}İşkencecinin seğiren parmakları, kurbanına uzanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer
